page.title: 05Diary 4
page.content: Daniel Hillman I wake up at 7:40 am.Breakfast consists of free-range eggs laid by our ducks and hens and toast. Our school bus picks us up at 8:25,as there is no public transport here. Our school bus has problems getting through the narrow lanes. At school on a Monday we write up our diary then we do handwiting. Our first break is from 10:30 to 10:45,then from 12:00 to 1:15,then from 2:30 to 2:45.At break time we sometimes go to the field.Our school dinners are prepared at Launceston and are just warmed up in our canteen,it is very small for 65p.After school it is sports club,at the moment we are practising for cluster sports.When we get home we have tea,pick up Drystan Jones and go to judo in Liskeard.When we get back I go to bed.
